translations: 贱妇；粗野女子；轻佻的女子

sentences.translation: 她是个厚颜无耻的贱妇。

sentences.sentence: You artful hussy! Now, tell me-didn't you make tHAT HAT blow off on purpose? I'll swear you did!
sentences.translation: 你这个诡计多端的小丫头片子！你告诉我，你是不是成心把帽子弄掉了的？我敢起誓说，一定是！

sentences.sentence: 'you artful hussy! Now, tell me - didn't you make that hat blow off on purpose? I'll swear you did!'
sentences.translation: 你这个耍滑头的野丫头！好吧，告诉你——你是不是故意让帽子给吹掉的？我敢发誓你是故意的！
